markups.originaltext: Deep one-class classification variants for anomaly detection learn a mapping thatconcentrates nominal samples in feature space causing anomalies to be mappedaway. Because this transformation is highly non-linear, finding interpretations posesa significant challenge

textblocks.text:
Deep one-class classification variants for anomaly detection learn a mapping that
concentrates nominal samples in feature space causing anomalies to be mapped
away. Because this transformation is highly non-linear, finding interpretations poses
a significant challenge

markups.originaltext: 存在问题，单分类不好解释
In our implementation, the center ccorresponds to the bias term in the last layer of our networks, i.e. is included in the network φ, whichis why we omit c in the FCDD objective below.

textblocks.text:
In our implementation, the center c
corresponds to the bias term in the last layer of our networks, i.e. is included in the network φ, which
is why we omit c in the FCDD objective below.
